text: Américo Gregorio Martín Estaba (1 February 1938 – 16 February 2022) was a Venezuelan politician. He was a member of A New Era. He was in the Venezuelan Chamber of Deputies from 1979 to 1984. Martín was born in Caracas, Venezuela. Martín died in Caracas on 16 February 2022, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Venezuelan politicians
title: Américo Martín
